mapper.sql: sMsgNo, sender, title, content, sDelFlag, regdate, code, rMsgNo, recipient, rDelFlag, readFlag
mapper.insert:
select sendMsg_seq.nextval from dual
insert into sendmsg(smsgNo, sender, title, content, code) values(#{sMsgNo}, #{sender}, #{title}, #{content}, #{code})
insert into receivemsg(rMsgNo, sMsgNo, recipient) values(receivemsg_seq.nextval, #{sMsgNo}, #{recipient})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from message where
sender=#{sender} and code=#{code} and sdelflag='N'

select count(*) from message where
recipient=#{recipient} and code!=#{code} and rdelflag='N'
select sMsgNo, rMsgNo, title, content, regdate, recipient, sender, code from message where sMsgno=#{sMsgNo}
mapper.update: update message set readflag='Y' where smsgno=#{sMsgNo}
